attributes.action: I want to share with you an idea should be applied in the economy
attributes.additional_details:
I have a new strategy for better economy .
How we will stop the economic bubbles?  How will we address the recession and inflation, create jobs , Guarantee prosperity for us and for our children and sustainable development in least 3 years according to my expectations, all that without prejudice to the framework of global competition and any system, thus solving the economic, so humanitarian and environmental problems .
Asked the reception in order to present an idea considered as a  “smart pragmatic strategy in the economic policy”.
Make no doubt of  any zone like an  active beehive , harmonious  and engine with all ideologies , systems , interests , that what will affect positively in all sectors , everything is relative and Forked in our world
I want to discuss the idea with you as soon  as possible , please .
Thank you
